review: So far it's good. We've only had it two weeks, but it is responding well. We did use an Ethernet cable to the Century Link , just to strengthen the signal. The only drawback is we can't figure how to hook up our wireless earphones. There is a splitter that we found but it was very unclear if it would work on the Amazon Fire. But the transition between Netflix and Amazon Prime is effortless. it's a good product.
